title: Skill Frontmatter
description: Schema for YAML frontmatter at the top of SKILL.md files. Contains skill identity (name, description) and optional loading behavior.

name.description: Skill display name including category path and author (e.g., 'frontend/react (@vince)')

description.description: Brief description of the skill's purpose and when to use it
examples: Zustand stores, client state patterns. Use when deciding between Zustand vs useState, managing global state, avoiding Context misuse, or handling form state.

preloaded.description: If true, skill content is embedded directly in compiled agent prompts. Default: false (loaded dynamically on demand)

examples.name: frontend/state-zustand (@vince)
examples.description: Zustand stores, client state patterns. Use when deciding between Zustand vs useState, managing global state, avoiding Context misuse, or handling form state.
